name: SIEMME 2016
tagline: The 22th China-Japan Bilateral Symposium on Intelligent Electrophotonic Materials and Molecular Electronics
body: SIEMME 2016, also _the 22th China-Japan Bilateral Symposium on Intelligent Electrophotonic Materials and Molecular Electronics_, is about to be held at the Hotel of [_Element Suzhou Science and Technology Town (Element Hotel)_](http://www.starwoodhotels.com/element/property/overview/index.html?propertyID=3967&language=en_US) in Suzhou city on September 22-24, 2016. [Southeast University](http://www.seu.edu.cn) (China) and [Tokyo University of Science](http://www.tus.ac.jp) (Japan) will organize the symposium together. Over 200 attendees from 36 academic or industrical affiliations will spread their new ideas on 3 topic sections with [5 plenary talks](#pt), 36 invited talks, 50 oral talks and 100 posters. ## plenary talks | [![Akira Fujishima](images/fujishima.jpg)][fujishima] | [![Lei Jiang](images/jiang.jpg)][jiang] | [![Kazuhiro Hashimoto](images/hashimoto.jpg)][hashimoto] | [![Yanling Song](images/song.jpg)][song] | [![Kam W. Leong](images/leong.jpg)][leong] | | ---- | ---- | ---- | ---- | ---- | | A. Fujishima | L. Jiang | K. Hashimoto | Y. Song | K. W. Leong | * `[PL01]`Akira Fujishima. *Recent Progress in Photocatalysis International Research Center.* * `[PL02]`Lei Jiang. *Smart Interfacial Materials from Super-Wettability to Binary Cooperative Complementary Systems.* * `[PL03]`Kazuhiro Hashimoto. *Challenges/Priorities in Japan around Advanced Materials Science and Engineering.* * `[PL04]`Yanling Song. *Nanomaterial green printing based on surface wettability manipulation.* * `[PL05]`Kam W. Leong. *Place the report title here.* [fujishima]: http://www.sut.ac.jp/en/initiatives/vol01 [jiang]: http://jianglei.iccas.ac.cn [hashimoto]: http://www.nims.go.jp/nims/ [song]: http://ylsong.iccas.ac.cn [leong]: http://bme.columbia.edu/kam-w-leong ## program flowchart ```flow st=>start: Opening address [08:30-08:45] e=>end: Banquet [18:30] op1=>operation: Plenary talk [08:45-11:45] op2=>operation: Lunch [11:45-13:00] op3=>operation: Invited & Oral talks (sections A, B, C) [13:00-17:26] st->op1->op2->op3->e ```
